Name: RDRTUploadAppraisal
Title: Uploading Appraisals
Body:
To upload an appraisal, open the Mission Profile, and click "Upload Appraisal" on the respective Deployment Card:

This will open the Appraisal Dialog.

Fill in the fields accordingly - choose a date.

To set a rating, click on the slider bar to activate it, then pull the handle left/right to set a rating value:

To upload an appraisal document, click the "Browse..." button to select a file. You can upload multiple files for the appraisal.

Finally, press "Save" to save the appraisal.

Once an appraisal has been uploaded, the link will change into "Open Appraisal". Use this link to update the appraisal and/or to upload more files.
